book.title: The Midnight Library
book.summary: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever. Every book provides a chance to try another life you could have lived.

review.comment: A beautiful, moving story that makes you think about the choices in life.
Profound and thought-provoking. Couldn't put it down!

book.title: Atomic Habits
book.summary: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones, focusing on tiny changes that lead to remarkable results.

reviews.comment: Life-changing approach to habit formation. Practical and actionable advice.

review.comment: Clear, concise, and incredibly useful. Have recommended to many friends.

book.title: Project Hail Mary
book.summary: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this incredible new science-based thriller from the #1 New York Times bestselling author of The Martian.

review.comment: Thrilling, clever, and surprisingly emotional. Andy Weir does it again!
The perfect blend of science and storytelling. Couldn't stop reading.

review.comment: A jaw-dropping twist that I never saw coming. Brilliant debut novel.

book.title: Becoming
book.summary: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

review.comment: Inspiring, honest, and beautifully written. A must-read autobiography.
Candid and compelling. Offers insight into an extraordinary journey.
